rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ETW1010, ETW2111} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 20, 41, 50}

description: Introduction to sample survey methods, quality management and statistical techniques for survey data used in business, industry and the public sector. Topics covered include the planning and execution of a survey, sampling methods, quality management and sampling, the design of experiments, analysis of variance and analysis of 'ranked data'.
